chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem. Thank you for your help,
Hello, My product is iPhone 12 mini and it has the above problem. Thank you for your help,

Hello!

The customer claims that the parcel was delivered empty. We have requested the BM certificate of non-receipt, pictures of the package, picture of the label with tracking number visible, pictures of the package inside (with the product received inside if any) and police report.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

Best regards,

Paulo - Back Market

Dear ecomobile

Apparently only the charging cable is missing, the customer just didn't fin the right Option to open the SAV accordingly. 

We are checking if he prefers a resending or CR for the missing charging cable. We will keep you posted afterwards. Please acknowledge the reception of this message in order for us to know that you are posted about the not needed carrier investigation. Thank you for understanding. 

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team

Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: 
charger missing 
Thank you very much for your help,

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer.

We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Rather than shipping the cable, would you consider a 10 euros commercial gesture instead to save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers to facilitate the shipment? 

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

thank you for the reply. We already offered the 10,00 €. But the customer, since the device originally uses a farts charging cable, wants 20-30 € to purchase one locally. We told her we can only offer 10,00 € or a redelivery of a compatible charging cable as per QC. Waiting for the respective selection. 

The customer now also reported an Aesthetic degree discrepancy. So we offered him the respective solution and are waiting for him to select. We will keep you posted regarding further developments. Thank you for understanding. 

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

The customer was offered 40,00 € for the grade discrepancy and accepted them. We will carry them out, once the issue with the cable is sorted out. 

The customer wants 20,00 € for the missing charging cable as the device uses a fast charging cable. Do you grant them? Otherwise, we cannot guarantee the customer ill not return the unit for a full refund.

Please let us know within 24 hours in order to act accordingly. Thank you for understanding.

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team

Hello ecomobile,

The customer had the following issue with their item: The aesthetic degree doesn't match the ordered degree (see proofs in the details of this SAV)

They would like a partial refund.

This message is just an FYI. I will take care of the partial refund. 

Thank you,

Paulo Back Market Customer Care
